mapper.select: SELECT ad_cost_no, ad_cost_type, ad_cost_perday, ad_cost_size FROM ad_cost WHERE ad_cost_no = #{adCostNo}
SELECT ad_group_no, ad_group_name, ad_group_date, ad_group_cost FROM ad_group WHERE ad_group_no = #{adGroupNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_register(member_id, ad_register_date, ad_cost_no, ad_register_start, ad_register_end, ad_group_no, ad_group_name, ad_register_link) VALUES(#{memberId},now(),#{adCost},#{adStart},#{adEnd},#{adGroup},#{adGroup},#{adLink})
INSERT INTO ad_file(member_id, ad_register_no, ad_file_path, ad_file_name, ad_file_extension, ad_file_form, ad_file_size, ad_file_date) VALUES(#{memberId},#{adRegisterNo})
